oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommon.core.rules.extension
Interface ActionUi

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApprovalGroupActionUiImpl, ApprovalsBaseActionUi, HierarchyPrincipalBasedActionUi, JobLevelActionUiImpl, SupervisoryActionUiImpl
public interface ActionUi

Interface to describe the UI informations for actions in an extension.

Method Summary
 RuleAction getAction()
          Return the associated action.
 Expression getDefaultValue(Parameter parameter)
          Return the default expression value of a parameter of the action.
 java.lang.String getDisplayName()
          Return the display name of the action.
 SummaryNodeLayout getSummaryNodeLayout()
          Return the layout for the Summary Node in the Rule Canvas for the action.
 java.lang.String getTaskflowId()
          Return the id of the task flow to invoke.
